headline: India's Winning Streak SHATTERED by Proteas!
hook_text: Shockwave in Ahmedabad! South Africa just ended India's 12-match winning streak in the T20 World Cup â€“ is the trophy slipping away?
details: The Narendra Modi Stadium witnessed a historic upset today as South Africa defeated India by 76 runs. Despite Jasprit Bumrah's record-breaking spell, David Miller's explosive 63 and a disciplined Proteas bowling attack dismantled the Indian middle order for just 111. This marks India's first defeat in the Super 8s, making their next clash against Zimbabwe a do-or-die encounter. Fans are questioning the top-order failure, while South Africa celebrates a massive boost to their NRR. More analysis coming up!
subscribe_hook: Can India bounce back against Zimbabwe or is it over? Comment your predictions! Hit subscribe & bell for instant T20 World Cup updates!
